com.cubeia.firebase.api.mtt.activator
Interface ActivatorContext

All Superinterfaces:
Context
public interface ActivatorContext
extends Context

Holds contextual references needed by implementing MTT Activator.

Author:
Fredrik

Method Summary

          This method returns a router for the activator which can be used to send events to tables and tournaments.

Parameters:
list - Config source listener, may be null

getActivatorRouter

ActivatorRouter getActivatorRouter()
This method returns a router for the activator which can be used to send events to tables and tournaments. To receive actions the activator should implement RoutableActivator.

Returns:
The activator router, never null
